reviewText: I bought this for my brother. We watched this show as kids and we loved it then and we still love it now!
I love watching voltron it is my favorite show

My favorite cartoon from my childhood! I had to buy the whole set. It's a very positive show with strong characters of both genders. When the music hits and the 5 lions come together to form Voltron....it's pure 80's awesome sauce.
cant wait to get the rest of the series
Awesome, great, loved this when I was a kid and still love it!!!!

avoid this 40% of the series had been removed. the rest had been edited to death. the story line on this is a American Cartoon not the Japanese Anime GOLION series
 Get GOLION  if you want the real deal.
BONETRON THE DEFENDER OF THE TOILET BOWL AND KILL THE TOILET!  BLAZING BONES!
IT IS VOLTRON! If you are an "80s baby" or just a Nerd, then this is like bible stories they told you... Let alone, Peter Cullen.
I am in love with this DVD. 80's kid, and this is exactly what I was looking for. I'll be purchasing the other collections.
I was happy with my purchase it was prompt and exactly what I wanted and affordable that's what's up. Yo
